title: Cybersecurity Ecommerce website looking for Marketing Advise
text:
I have the product and making it live next year to the general public. I want to create a digital marketing strategy to help me fight against giant competitors spending a fortune on Google Advertisements. Unfortunately, I have a very limited budget for most of my funding and bootstrap startup. Is there any good alternative for a cyber security startup that sells products online to market them without spending a fortune on Google Ads? I am looking for some really good suggestions as my budget is around $2000 per month.

Please help me with your ideas and thoughts about this.

title: Donald Knuth's 2022 'Christmas Tree' Lecture Is about Trees

Do you know any games similar to “The game”?
text:
I've been recently trying to find games to pass the time with colleagues similar to "The game" https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Game_(mind_game), "Yellow car" http://www.yellowcargame.co.uk/pages/officialrules.htm or "Mariah Carey challenge" https://www.unibetcommunity.com/forums/topic/20669-christmas-quotno-mariah-careyquot-challenge/

The main principle is that the game should be offline, is always on and you should need as little equipment as possible in order to play.

Does something comes to your mind?

Ask HN: High paying job or better position and comforts
text:
Hello people, I need some help in deciding what to do next ?

I have a job offer which pays 85% more compared to my current salary, but the down point is that I have to migrate to another country for it. And another down point is that there I'll have to do basic development tasks.

My current job, is in my city, offers work from home, offers me freedom to do freelance work, and has offered manager position.

I am currently single, looking to start a family so thinking to have some stability prior to that.

I am confused, can someone help with what they do to decide in such situations ? Any comment, or suggestion or advice is appreciated.
